flavorText: With a reckless leap into the pilot's seat, Hirori went from smallest kid on the block to biggest hero in the city.

foreignData.flavorText: Mit einem waghalsigen Sprung in den Pilotensitz wurde Hirori vom kleinsten Kind im Viertel zur größten Heldin der Stadt.
foreignData.name: Volle Montur
foreignData.text:
Bis zum Ende des Zuges wird eine Kreatur oder ein Fahrzeug deiner Wahl zu einer Artefaktkreatur mit Basis-Stärke und -Widerstandskraft 4/5.
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Con un salto temerario al asiento del piloto, Hirori pasó de ser la chica más bajita del grupo a la heroína más alta de la ciudad.
foreignData.name: Pilotar
foreignData.text:
Hasta el final del turno, la criatura o Vehículo objetivo se convierte en una criatura artefacto con fuerza y resistencia base de 4/5.
Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Bondissant sans réfléchir dans le siège du pilote, Hirori passa instantanément du gamin le plus petit du quartier au plus grand héros de la ville.
foreignData.name: Mettre l'armure
foreignData.text:
Jusqu'à la fin du tour, une cible, créature ou véhicule, devient une créature-artefact avec une force et une endurance de base de 4/5.
Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Con un balzo spericolato verso la cabina di pilotaggio, Hirori passò da essere la bambina più piccola del quartiere alla più grande eroina della città.
foreignData.name: Indossare l'Armatura
foreignData.text:
Fino alla fine del turno, una creatura o un Veicolo bersaglio diventa una creatura artefatto con forza e costituzione base 4/5.
Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 勇敢にも操縦席に飛び込んだ弘理は、近所一の小柄な子供から、都市最大のヒーローへと変わった。
foreignData.name: 装身
foreignData.text:
クリーチャーや機体のうち１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは基本のパワーとタフネスが４/５のアーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。
カード１枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText: 조종석에 무모하게 뛰어듦으로써, 히로리는 동네에서 가장 작은 꼬마에서 도시의 가장 큰 영웅이 되었다.
foreignData.name: 슈트 착용
foreignData.text:
생물 또는 탑승물을 목표로 정한다. 턴종료까지, 그 목표는 기본 공격력 및 방어력이 4/5인 마법물체 생물이 된다.
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Pular intrépida no assento do piloto fez Hirori passar de caçula da rua a maior heroína da cidade.
foreignData.name: Vestir Armadura
foreignData.text:
Até o final do turno, a criatura ou o Veículo alvo torna-se uma criatura artefato com poder e resistência básicos 4/5.
Compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: Безрассудно прыгнув в кресло пилота, Хирори превратилась из самой маленькой девчушки в квартале в самую великую героиню в городе.
foreignData.name: Становление
foreignData.text:
До конца хода целевое существо или Машина становится артефактом существом с базовой силой и выносливостью 4/5.
Возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 弘理纵身跳向机师驾驶座，转眼就从街区最弱少年摇身变为城中最大英雄。
foreignData.name: 全装上阵
foreignData.text:
直到回合结束，目标生物或载具成为基础力量与防御力为4/5的神器生物。
抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 弘理縱身跳向機師駕駛座，轉眼就從街區最弱少年搖身變為城中最大英雄。
foreignData.name: 全裝上陣
foreignData.text:
直到回合結束，目標生物或載具成為基礎力量與防禦力為4/5的神器生物。
抽一張牌。

name: Suit Up
originalText:
Until end of turn, target creature or Vehicle becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 4/5.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Suit Up will overwrite any previous effects that set the creature or Vehicle's power and toughness to specific numbers. Effects that otherwise modify its power and toughness will still apply no matter when they took effect. The same is true for +1/+1 counters.
If Suit Up causes a Vehicle to become an artifact creature, it doesn't count as “crewing” that Vehicle for any ability that would trigger off of a Vehicle becoming crewed.

The creature or planeswalker card you return to your hand is not chosen until after you mill three cards. You may choose a creature or planeswalker card from among all the cards in your graveyard, including the milled cards.

text:
Until end of turn, target creature or Vehicle becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 4/5.
Draw a card.
